## About Acorn
Acorn provides a powerful yet accessible image editing experience that combines the sophistication of professional graphics software with an intuitive interface designed for photographers, designers, and digital artists. As a versatile raster and vector editor, Acorn enables users to tackle everything from simple photo corrections to elaborate digital artwork without the complexity often associated with advanced image editing applications. The software's responsive performance and streamlined workflow make it an ideal choice for both occasional users and creative professionals who need reliable editing capabilities.

The desktop application delivers comprehensive image editing functionality across both macOS and Windows platforms, featuring non-destructive filters, advanced selection tools, and robust text handling capabilities. Acorn's scriptable architecture allows for automation of repetitive tasks, while its support for plugins extends functionality for specialized workflows. With features like perspective correction, content-aware fill, and advanced color management, Acorn maintains compatibility with industry standards while offering unique tools that enhance creativity and productivity for web design, photo editing, and digital illustration projects.

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   500 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   500 MB of available storage space
